metadata.dc:author: Calvo, C
Ecija, J L
Lajo, A
Vázquez-Martul, M
Collado, F
Navarro, M
metadata.dc:description: Urinary tract infection was studied in 61 children whose ages ranged between 6 months and 9 years. History, symptoms, urine cultures and renal function are compared between those with normal radiology and those with pyelonephritis and/or reflux and obstructive lesions. Prognosis was analized in these two groups.
metadata.dc:title: Historia natural de las infecciones del tracto urinario en niños
[Natural history of urinary tract infection in children].
